RECOMMENDED FOR YOU

Product Information

Brilliant Wish is an amber floral fragrance for women created by Louise Turner and Michel Girard, and launched in 2010 by Chopard.

Features

The top notes are Pink Pepper and Fruity Notes, the middle notes are Star Jasmine and Violet Leaf whilst the base notes are Amber, Woody Notes and Musk. The fragrance is sparkling, fresh and bright with a classiness running through it. It's sweet but not cloying and as a result it's a fragrance that's suitable for year round wear.

Product Specification

Product code: mp-00032117

EAN: 3414200516006

Your Choices Regarding Cookies on this Site

Your experience on our website is important to us which is why we use cookies to help us improve it and to be able to show you personalised content. You can manage your cookie preferences below and/or click here to read more about our
privacy policy.

Manage Consent Preferences

Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They help us make our website usable, enabling you to move around the site and use its features

Functional Cookies

These cookies help us to provide a personalised experience through enhanced functionality on our website and to improve the customer experience of our website by understanding how visitors get to the website and move around it. On some web pages we work with Third Party providers to improve the functionality of a page. This information is anonymous as the data is aggregated. Switching these off may mean some areas of the website may not work properly.

Advertising Cookies

These cookies help us advertise products and services on other websites that we think are relevant to you. Switching these off will mean you won't see personalised and targeted adverts from us.
